name: Finger on the Line - Fast Action Music Games
name_original: Finger on the Line - Fast Action Music Games
description:
“Finger on the Line!” is a beautifully designed and highly addictive minimalistic game featuring original soundtracks! Try your reaction rate with this fast paced endless maze runner game now for FREE!!!

Place and hold your finger in the middle of the circle to enter the maze. The objective is to stay in the line for as long as possible without touching the walls or any blocks/movable objects within the line. The pace starts out slow but will constantly accelerate to a higher speed. Release your finger at anytime to pause the game. Press and hold where you left off on the screen to resume the game.

Looking for a greater challenge and addiction? Get the pro-version today: Finger on the Line Pro! Now featuring longer and harder tracks, 10 amazing soundtracks, and completely ad free!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Why you’ll LOVE Finger on the Line!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Randomly generated mazes. Every maze is a different one!
Endless game play
Silky-smooth game experience
Enlarged lines for different finger sizes
Compete with players world-wide on GameCenter
